name: Cabinet d'avocats SAMMAN
goal:
SAMMAN Law & Corporate Affairs is one of the few French law firms specializing in public and regulatory affairs and practicing in both Paris and Brussels.

Our expertise lays on: a cross-practice team of lawyers and consultants with multiple areas of specialization; the double location of our office in Paris and Brussels; and a strong and innovative vision of the legal profession.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Legislative and non-legislative initiatives falling under:
Digital Single Market strategy;
Capital Markets Union strategy.
